config.name: CCBill
config.help:
Support Fixed payment
Salt key is a unique number which is use to identify the hash. It can be generated by either
1. Contacting client support and receive the salt value, OR
2. Create your own salt value and provide it to client support.

NOTE:-1. Please set webhook url on ccbill's end to:- www.your_website.com/index.php?option=com_payinvoice&view=invoice&task=notify&processor=ccbill&
2. Don't forget to add & at the end of webhook url.
3. Set approval url to www.your_website.com/index.php?option=com_payinvoice&view=invoice&task=complete&invoice_number=%%invoice_number%%
NOTE:-1. Please set webhook url on ccbill's end to:- www.your_website.com/index.php?option=com_paycart&view=cart&task=notify&processor=ccbill&
2. Don't forget to add & at the end of webhook url.
3. Set approval url to www.your_website.com/index.php?option=com_paycart&view=invoice&task=complete&processor=ccbill&invoice_number=%%invoice_number%%
